Lines: This time it's a bit of an irregular job.
Klaus, did you get that thing?
I managed to get one from research department,
captured in Far East.
But what are we going to do with Federeation MS?
Federation MS?
There are rules in war,
but this time we are going to do something
that would normally be illegal.
Are you going to disguise yourself as
the enemy, and blend into the search party?
Yes. I'll blend in with enemy MS and
locate droppods. Then we will destroy
enemy earch party and retrieve them.
You've thought of something crazy again...
What about ID? You're going to be discovered quickly.
Oh, I think I can fool them for a little while.
I'm looking forward to it, thanks.
This time, it's a race against time.
Leo will scout ahead for droppods,
then we'll join in to ambush search party.
We'll withdraw before enemy reinforcements arrive.
It was risky getting those supplies down to Earth.
While supplies are essential, boosting morale by
delivering them is more important.
Well, deceiving someone through disguise
isn't thart dirty work, when compared
to attack on colonies at start of war...
Good. Brauer's Team, prepare to sortie!
Roger that!
